my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories is about our successful installation of an alarm system for the protection of Indian government weapons at CISF, Suraksha Campus in Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu, India. Our team's dedication and expertise in providing top-notch security solutions made a significant impact in safeguarding such critical assets, and it was an honor to contribute to the safety of such an important facility. This accomplishment exemplified the true power of our services in protecting valuable resources and further strengthened our commitment to providing top-of-the-line security solutions for our clients.

name: Maheswaran R.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a builder, contractor, or hardware dealer who needs a reliable and timely supplier of cement and steel for their ongoing or upcoming projects. I also work closely with architects, civil engineers, and construction material shops who prefer trusted partners for consistent quality and delivery. Anyone planning to build a house or commercial building is also an ideal referral for Ranga Agencies.
top_problem_solved: During a period of material shortage, We utilized our 12,000 sq. ft. warehouse capacity to ensure uninterrupted supply of cement and steel to Mr. Chandran, a contractor. Thanks to our timely delivery, his drainage project at Sriperumbudur was completed before the rainy season, preventing major public inconvenience and resolving long-standing drainage issues in the area. This experience highlights our commitment to reliability and social responsibility — ensuring that even during supply challenges, essential public works continue without delay.
my_favourite_bni_story: I joined BNI in 2020, right in the middle of the COVID-19 pandemic, when the entire supply chain was disrupted. At that time, our local market faced a severe steel shortage due to labor issues and steel mill shutdowns. Through BNI, I connected with Mr. Sandeep Daga from BNI Raipur, who became my trusted business partner. Despite the challenges, he ensured continuous steel supply from Raipur, allowing me to serve my customers without any interruption. I purchased over ₹1 crore worth of steel from him — even before our chapter officially launched — and proudly became a Crorepati Member. More importantly, that experience taught me the true value of Givers Gain® and the power of BNI relationships. It was the day I made a lifetime decision to stay committed to BNI. Our friendship and business relationship with Mr. Sandeep Daga continue strong even today.
